name.ja: ミラーリング・ワイバーン

requirement.en: If the only monsters in your Graveyard are High Dragon and/or Dragon Type monsters during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, this turn, this card's name becomes the same as the name of the monster Special Summoned by this effect.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
